name: { No. 36 } RUBY RED & TARTAN BOW TIE COLLAR
description:
Bow Tie: red tartan Jewels: crystal Collar: ruby red Let your pup sparkle this Holiday Season in our special holiday Bow Tie Collars! Each collar has festive jewels and a holiday bow tie designed to let your pup shine! Created in small batches with a focus on precise tailoring, each handcrafted bow tie has velvet elastic loops secured at two points on the back for a solid grip.
  • adjustable
  • collar width & bow ties are proportionate to dog's neck size
  • moveable and removable bow tie
  • secure, traditional buckle
  • brushed nickel hardware for leash and tags
  • triple-stitched at all stress points
  • extra thick & durable, USA-milled nylon
All Dapper Dog products are created using U.S. made and sourced materials. Designed & Made in Brooklyn, NY

name: { No. 40 } BURLAP BOW TIE
description: Colors: brown Pattern: burlap Special for Fall and on trend for the season, Burlap Bow Ties are handcrafted in Brooklyn. With a velvet elastic loop sewn sturdily onto the back, these bow ties simply slide onto your pups collar. Or, mix and match with any of our bow tie collars! - Small are best for very small breed pups (i.e. Chihuahuas, Yorkies). - Large are best for medium to extra large breeds (i.e. Frenchy's, Labradors, Great Danes). All Dapper Dog products are created using U.S. made and sourced materials. Designed in Brooklyn / Made in Louisville, KY / Eco-Friendly
